name: Reading Progress Bar
description: This plugin adds a visual reading progress bar to your posts, indicating how much of the article has been scrolled through.
author: htejera

messageInOptions.text: Customize the appearance and position of the reading progress bar.

config.name: barColor
config.label: Bar Color
config.note: Set the color of the progress bar.

config.name: barHeight
config.label: Bar Height
config.note: Set the height of the progress bar in pixels.
